data.title: Francisco Javier Ramírez Acuña
data.text:
Born: 22-Apr-1952

Birthplace: Jamay, Jalisco, Mexico

Gender: Male

Religion: Roman Catholic

Race or Ethnicity: Hispanic

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Government

Nationality: Mexico

Executive summary: Mexican Minister of the Interior, 2006-08

Brother: José Cornelio Ramírez Acuña (former mayor of Zapopan)

Wife: María de la Paz Verduzco

Daughter: María de la Paz

Son: Francisco José

Daughter: Laura

Son: Juan Carlos

University: Law, University of Guadalajara, Guadalajara

Mexican Minister Interior (2006-08)

Mexican Governor Jalisco (2001-06)

Mexican Mayor Guadalajara (1998-2000)

Mexican Official Director of Sistecozome (1995-97)

Partido Accion Nacional 1960
